Banner.Description: Web developer with 10 years of experience in the workplace, focused on back-end development. I specialize in technologies such as PHP with its different frameworks (Laravel and Codeigniter), in addition to the C# language and its Asp.net Core framework.
AboutMe.Title: About Me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In these years of experience I have been in positions such as: systems analyst, backend developer and technical leader. I really like using web development for problem solving.
Among my capabilities are the creation of APIs, creation of web pages and applications, creation of background processes (jobs, queues) and implementing improvements within systems processes.
Among the technologies in which I have trained and worked are:
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Web Developer
Description: New functionalities such as motorized allocation and Pickup order management, among others, within the POS system made with php, jquery, javascript and css
Modifications and new processes of the new Pos system made with C# in Asp.net Core and Angular
Creation of APIs in Laravel for integrations with delivery platforms (PedidosYA, Justo, Uber)
Creation of functions and stored procedures in SQL Server for processing the received information
Creation of jobs in Laravel to execute heavy processes in the background (requests to different APIs and print submissions)

Modifications in the angular web application made for the management of shifts of incoming orders (Adapt page so that the shifts are displayed vertically and corrections in status changes with QR reader)

Experience.Jobs.Title: Web Developer
Description: Creation of web application for balance inquiries for clients carried out in Laravel
Creation of B2B web pages to consult product prices using the Vtex e-commerce platform
Maintenance and corrections to different web applications in Laravel (price and offer updates, customer queries and follow-ups) used by administrative staff

Experience.Jobs.Title: Programmer semi-senior
Description: Maintenance and creation of methods in educational management systems (company's own framework made in PHP)
Creation of cronjobs in Laravel for background processes for note processing and calculations
Creation of unit tests (TDD) of the new methods created (PhpUnit)
Realization of queries to output reports (grades, subjects by teacher, students) in mysql
Technical analysis to know how to carry out the new requirements within the educational management system
Educational management system training for new team members

Experience.Jobs.Title: Programmer junior
Description: Support and development (Review and processing of meter images, map of reading taking coordinates and impressions.) in reading-billing web applications made in CodeIgniter
Creation of a batch process to obtain billing data from payrolls done with C# in .net core
Creation of functions, triggers and stored procedures in Oracle for consumption calculations and reading taking information

FeatureProjects.Title: My Projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Highlighted Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Task manager
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Web application for managing personal tasks, allows the creation, editing and deletion of tasks. View project online: http://taskmanagerpremium.somee.com/

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Api person
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: API to enter, consult, edit and delete information about people, includes swagger for documentation. View project online: http://www.apipersons.somee.com/swagger/

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Portfolio
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Personal website, where you can find my information and my experience in web development

Contact.Title: Request me!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your message if you want to talk about new job opportunities. I will reply to you as soon as I can.
